document.full_text: the chicago police department wants to construct a firing range on 33 acres near a marsh that is a favored nesting ground for migratory birds. some people are not pleased.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: gun range near birds is opposed
lines_and_colors: the chicago police department wants to construct a firing range on 33 acres near a marsh that is a favored nesting ground for migratory birds. some people are not pleased.
